thread.title: Prince George RCMP seek public's help in locating robbery suspect - Prince George Citizen
thread.title_full: Prince George RCMP seek public's help in locating robbery suspect - Prince George Citizen

author: Citizen Staff
title: Prince George RCMP seek public's help in locating robbery suspect - Prince George Citizen
text:
The Prince George RCMP is calling on the public for assistance in locating 22-year-old Ashden Keith Scheper.
Scheper is wanted on an endorsed warrant for robbery. He is described as a Caucasian male, standing six feet tall (183 cm) and weighing approximately 165 pounds (75 kg). He has blonde hair and green eyes.
Authorities warn that Scheper is considered dangerous and should not be approached. Anyone who spots him is urged to contact local police immediately.
Call Prince George RCMP at 250-561-3300 with tips. Those wanting to remain anonymous can call Crime Stopers at 1-800-222-8477 (TIPS).
Suspects wanted on endorsed warrants may be released once arrested and ordered to appear in court.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->robbery and theft
